summary.span: Performs reflection on a module.

span.span: Performs reflection on a module.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 模組是可攜式的可執行檔，諸如 type.dll 或 application.exe，其中包含一或多個類別和介面。A module is a portable executable file, such as type.dll or application.exe, consisting of one or more classes and interfaces. 多個命名空間可能包含在單一模組中，並且命名空間可以擴展多個模組。There may be multiple namespaces contained in a single module, and a namespace may span multiple modules. 已部署為一個單元的一個或多個模組會組成組件。One or more modules deployed as a unit compose an assembly. 使用多個模組建立組件的詳細資訊，請參閱[多檔案組件](~/docs/framework/app-domains/multifile-assemblies.md)。For information about creating an assembly with more than one module, see [Multifile Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/multifile-assemblies.md). 請注意，.NET Framework 模組不程式設計人員用來組織函式和副程式的應用程式中的 Visual Basic 中的模組相同。Note that a .NET Framework module is not the same as a module in Visual Basic, which is used by a programmers to organize functions and subroutines in an application. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用反映來取得模組的相關資訊：The following code examples show how to use reflection to get information about modules: [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Module#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Module/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Module#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Module/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是特殊類別載入例外狀況。 is a special class load exception. `ReflectionTypeLoadException.Types`屬性包含的模組中所定義，且已載入類別之陣列。The `ReflectionTypeLoadException.Types` property contains the array of classes that were defined in the module and were loaded. 這個陣列可包含部分 null 值。This array may contain some null values. `ReflectionTypeLoadException.LoaderExceptions`屬性為陣列，代表類別載入器擲回的例外狀況的例外狀況。The `ReflectionTypeLoadException.LoaderExceptions` property is an array of exceptions that represent the exceptions that were thrown by the class loader. 類別陣列漏洞產品有例外狀況。The holes in the class array line up with the exceptions. 所指定的委派`filter`會呼叫每個類別，在模組中，傳遞`Type`物件，表示類別，以及指定`filterCriteria`。The delegate given by `filter` is called for each class in the module, passing along the `Type` object representing the class as well as the given `filterCriteria`. 如果`filter`傳回特定類別，該類別將會包含在傳回的陣列。If `filter` returns a particular class, that class will be included in the returned array. 如果`filter`會傳回`null`，會傳回所有類別和`filterCriteria`會被忽略。If `filter` returns `null`, all classes are returned and `filterCriteria` is ignored. `FindTypes` 不能用於查詢參數化的型別，例如陣列。`FindTypes` cannot be used to look up parameterized types such as arrays. ## Examples 下列範例示範`FindTypes`方法。The following example demonstrates the `FindTypes` method. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Module.FilterTypeName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Module.FilterTypeName Example/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Module.FilterTypeName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Module.FilterTypeName Example/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Module.FilterTypeName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Module.FilterTypeName Example/VB/class1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReflectionTypeLoadException` 是特殊的負載的例外狀況。`ReflectionTypeLoadException` is a special load exception. `ReflectionTypeLoadException.Types`屬性包含的模組中所定義，以及已載入的型別陣列。The `ReflectionTypeLoadException.Types` property contains the array of types that were defined in the module and were loaded. 這個陣列可包含部分 null 值。This array may contain some null values. `ReflectionTypeLoadException.LoaderExceptions`屬性為陣列，代表載入器擲回的例外狀況的例外狀況。The `ReflectionTypeLoadException.LoaderExceptions` property is an array of exceptions that represent the exceptions that were thrown by the loader. 類別陣列漏洞產品有例外狀況。The holes in the class array line up with the exceptions. 例如，如果其中一個類別的類別初始設定式擲回例外狀況，它載入時，`TargetInvocationException`中的對應項目會儲存`LoaderExceptions`陣列。For example, if the class initializers of one of the classes throws an exception while it is being loaded, a `TargetInvocationException` is stored in the corresponding element of the `LoaderExceptions` array. > [!NOTE] > 如果類型已轉送至另一個組件，它不包含傳回陣列中。If a type has been forwarded to another assembly, it is not included in the returned array. 類型轉送上的資訊，請參閱[Common Language Runtime 中的型別轉送](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md)。For information on type forwarding, see [Type Forwarding in the Common Language Runtime](~/docs/framework/app-domains/type-forwarding-in-the-common-language-runtime.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要解決的父代的識別欄位的中繼資料語彙基元`TypeSpec`具有簽章包含項目型別`ELEMENT_TYPE_VAR`或是`ELEMENT_TYPE_MVAR`，使用方法多載，可讓您提供必要的內容。To resolve a metadata token that identifies a field whose parent `TypeSpec` has a signature containing element type `ELEMENT_TYPE_VAR` or `ELEMENT_TYPE_MVAR`, use the method overload, which allows you to supply the necessary context. 也就是當您正在解決的欄位，取決於泛型型別和 （或） 權杖會內嵌的泛型方法的泛型類型參數的中繼資料語彙基元，您必須使用可讓您提供這些型別參數的多載。That is, when you are resolving a metadata token for a field that depends on the generic type parameters of the generic type and/or the generic method in which the token is embedded, you must use the overload that allows you to supply those type parameters. > [!NOTE] > 中繼資料語彙基元的相關資訊可在 Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 文件，尤其是"Partition II:: 中繼資料定義和語意 >。Information about metadata tokens can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 線上; 會提供文件請參閱[ECMA C# 和 Common Language Infrastructure 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)MSDN 上並[標準 ECMA-335-通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) ECMA 網站上。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the ECMA Web site. 如示範語彙基元解析程式碼使用一般的內容 （也就是泛型型別和 （或） 權杖會內嵌的泛型方法的泛型型別參數） 請參閱方法。For code that demonstrates token resolution using the generic context (that is, the generic type parameters of the generic type and/or the generic method in which the token is embedded) see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要解決的中繼資料語彙基元`MethodSpec`其簽章包含項目型別`ELEMENT_TYPE_VAR`或是`ELEMENT_TYPE_MVAR`，使用方法多載，可讓您提供必要的內容。To resolve a metadata token for a `MethodSpec` whose signature contains element type `ELEMENT_TYPE_VAR` or `ELEMENT_TYPE_MVAR`, use the method overload, which allows you to supply the necessary context. 也就是說，當您正在解決的方法，取決於泛型類型的泛型類型參數及/或權杖會內嵌的泛型方法的中繼資料語彙基元，您必須使用可讓您提供這些型別參數的多載。That is, when you are resolving a metadata token for a method that depends on the generic type parameters of the generic type and/or the generic method in which the token is embedded, you must use the overload that allows you to supply those type parameters. > [!NOTE] > 中繼資料語彙基元的相關資訊可在 Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 文件，尤其是"Partition II:: 中繼資料定義和語意 >。Information about metadata tokens can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 線上; 會提供文件請參閱[ECMA C# 和 Common Language Infrastructure 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)MSDN 上並[標準 ECMA-335-通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) ECMA 網站上。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the ECMA Web site. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用兩個多載泛型和非泛型的內容中的方法來解析中繼資料語彙基元，從呼叫站台。The following example shows how to use the two overloads of the method to resolve metadata tokens from call sites in generic and non-generic contexts. 此程式碼範例會定義兩個泛型型別，`G1`並`G2`(`G1(Of Tg1)`和`G2(Of Tg2)`Visual Basic 中)，每個都有泛型方法。The code example defines two generic types, `G1` and `G2` (`G1(Of Tg1)` and `G2(Of Tg2)` in Visual Basic), each of which has a generic method. `G1` 也有 使用類型參數 přepisuje neobecnou metodu`Tg1`其參數。`G1` also has a non-generic method that uses the type parameter `Tg1` for its parameter. 泛型方法`GM2`型別中`G2`包含數個方法呼叫：The generic method `GM2` in type `G2` contains several method calls: - 案例 1： 泛型方法`GM1`呼叫時，使用的類型參數`G2`和`GM2`做為型別引數。Case 1: The generic method `GM1` is called, using the type parameters of `G2` and `GM2` as the type arguments. 換句話說，呼叫方法的參數型別取決於用來建構封閉式的泛型型別中的類型定義的型別`G2`。In other words, the parameter types of the called method will depend on the types that are used to construct a closed generic type from the type definition for `G2`. - 案例 2: Přepisuje neobecnou metodu`M1`呼叫。Case 2: The non-generic method `M1` is called. 會使用定義的類型，類型參數，此方法的參數`G1`，這由封入類型，型別參數在此情況下取代`G2`。The parameter of this method uses the type parameter of the defining type, `G1`, which is replaced in this case by the type parameter of the enclosing type, `G2`. - 案例 3： 泛型方法`GM1`呼叫時，指定和的型別引數的泛型型別和泛型的方法，分別。Case 3: The generic method `GM1` is called, specifying and for the type arguments of the generic type and the generic method, respectively. 這個方法呼叫不會相依於封入型別或方法的型別參數。This method call does not depend on the type parameters of the enclosing type or method. - 案例 4: Přepisuje neobecnou metodu`M1`的`Example`類別稱為。Case 4: The non-generic method `M1` of the `Example` class is called. 這個方法呼叫不會相依於封入型別或方法的型別參數。This method call does not depend on the type parameters of the enclosing type or method. 此外，此範例會定義非泛型`Example`類別。In addition, the example defines the non-generic `Example` class. 此類別具有方法`M`，它會呼叫泛型方法：This class has a method `M` that makes a call to a generic method: - 案例 5： 泛型方法`GM1`呼叫時，指定和的型別引數的泛型型別和泛型的方法，分別。Case 5: The generic method `GM1` is called, specifying and for the type arguments of the generic type and the generic method, respectively. 這個方法的內容有沒有封入泛型類型或泛型方法。The context for this method has no enclosing generic type or generic method. 針對每個案例中，此範例先建構表示所呼叫的方法，然後會將權杖使用解析方法多載，使用並方法，以取得的值`genericTypeArguments`和`genericMethodArguments`參數。For each case, the example first constructs a that represents the called method, and then resolves the token using the method overload, using the and methods to get the values for the `genericTypeArguments` and `genericMethodArguments` parameters. 這項技術的運作方式在所有情況下，因為方法會傳回非泛型內容。This technique works in all cases, because the methods return for non-generic contexts. 這個範例會比較已解析與建構。The example compares the resolved with the constructed . 此範例會嘗試使用方法多載來解析權杖。The example then attempts to use the method overload to resolve the token. 這是在 3、 4 和 5 的情況下，因為方法呼叫不相依於一般的內容。This works in cases 3, 4, and 5, because the method calls do not depend on the generic context. 在 1 和 2 的情況下，因為資訊不足，無法解析語彙基元，會擲回例外狀況。In cases 1 and 2, an exception is thrown because there is insufficient information to resolve the token. 中繼資料語彙基元的值為硬式編碼為列舉型別。The metadata token values are hard-coded as an enumeration. 如果您變更此程式碼範例，語彙基元的值可能會變更。If you change this code example, the token values are likely to change. 若要判斷新的權杖值，編譯程式碼，並使用與 Ildasm.exe **/權杖**來檢查組件的選項。To determine the new token values, compile the code and use Ildasm.exe with the **/TOKENS** option to examine the assembly. 語彙基元位於呼叫點。The tokens can be found at the points of call. 將新的值插入至列舉型別，並重新編譯範例。Insert the new values into the enumeration, and recompile the example.
